name: Smashy Ducks - Battle Arena
description:
There are ducks. Exploding ducks.
These ducks hate gold. You have a lot of gold.
Smash up the ducks before they blow up your gold!!
It's pretty self explanatory really.

"Crossy Road meets Animal Crossing" - Smashy Ducks fan

You have a beautiful castle in a forest, which is filled with gold. Unfortunately this forest is filled with evil ducks, that HATE gold. Did I mention that these were exploding ducks?
You have to defend your castle against these voxel creatures, so they won't destroy your gold!

FEATURES
- Tons of different enemies
- Use mines to create strategy
- Amazing explosion effects
- Great visuals and sound!
- Weather system coming soon!
- 2 player split-screen coming soon!

This is a crafty voxel game, which places you right int he action! Battle these ducks in your castle arena, smash them on the road before they can get to you! These cute animals are a lot more dangerous than you think, don't be distracted by their blocky and voxel shapes.
